website_summaries.verdict: The perfect liquid lip to throw on in the morning and not have to worry about touching up throughout the day.
pros: Available in a wide range of colors – from nude to turquoise
Formula is creamy and applies smooth and even
Highly pigmented colors appear vibrant after just one swipe
A little product goes a long way
Matte finish lasts all day without drying or cracking
cons: Continued use may dry out your lips

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I Love it! Beautiful, Nude/Pinkish color. The color lasts through meals and looks amazing on any skin tone. Will definitely re-purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cristina

customer_reviews.title: love the color... but product didn’t have seal
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and texture of this lipstick. But I don’t think it lives up to its name— Everlasting Liquid Lipstick. I ate lunch and it was pretty much gone. Anyway, I included a photo to show the pigment and that it’s a nice reddish brown color. The other reason I didn’t give this five stars was because the product arrived well- packages by Amazon, but there was no seal. So you can’t be 100% sure if it was not tested/ returned and re-sold. I wonder if other buyers have the same experience with the lipstick having no seal. It’s labelled “NEW”.
customer_reviews.author: Rissa Cortez

customer_reviews.title: I just discovered Kat Von D's liquid lip-colors and I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: I just discovered Kat Von D's liquid lip-colors and I'm in love! I've been using her eye liner for a while (BEST ever, will be there the next day through sweating), so I thought I'd try the rest of the line; they last quite a while and most importantly they won't make your lips dry if you choose to wear it matte (they're matte by default, you'd have to add lipgloss for shine). I reapply twice a day, but I drink coffee a couple times a day and water non-stop, so I give it a lot of wear and tear. Overall, great durability and a great selection colors overall.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: really cute and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical this was a knock off but after a really close inspection it was just like the one I get from Sephora and works amazing! I really like all kat von d lipsticks and this is my my favorite color
customer_reviews.author: strangedunyah

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great color! It's darker than I thought it would be so it makes me look a bit emo since I dyed my hair darker, but it's very sophisticated and stays on nicely. If you're eating food or getting it too wet from drinking, it will usually come off around the center of your lips. I'd recommend keeping it on hand if you're using it for a night out, and just reapplying when necessary. It also dries your lips out a bit so be sure to wear chapstick when you're not wearing this.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, I get so many compliments!
customer_reviews.text: Great!!! Love this color! I get so many compliments when I wear it! I probably only need to reapply after eating something greasy, or wet. but overall it last a long time. very please!
customer_reviews.author: Christina RodriguezTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Wear and tear
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, it's hard buying things without trying it on, but I kept it because it did look good. I wore it to a wedding this weekend and I had put it on and on exiting the hotel being rushed out, I forgot it. It managed to stay on for the better portion of the night and when it did finally wear off, it didn't look all flaky and pealy like some do. I'm into it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Pretty! It's a great MLBB shade❣️
customer_reviews.text: I love the shade Lolita II and I've been wanting to try this shade for awhile. It's very pretty! It's a nice MLBB shade. Nice for every day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Begley

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color! My only complaint is that it does dry out your lips, but this is to be expected since it is a matte lipstick. A simple solution that has helped me is to apply chapstick underneath it to hydrate my lips. The color lasts quite long and it flatters many complexions. I have a number of friends who are all different skin tones and the color looks lovely on all of us.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Parkinson

customer_reviews.title: No more reapplying!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after commenting on someone’s lip color. When I heard it lasts all day I had to try it. I am constantly re-applying lipstick through the day. This stuff is amazing!! It goes on a little glossy and dries matte and lasts for hours!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Nice lipstick, but not well packaged.
customer_reviews.text: This Everlasting Liquid Lipstick feels very nice on the lips. Not heavy or drying. Does not need to be re-applied too often. The color is pretty. So in those respects I would definitely recommend trying it. The 4 stars instead of 5 is because the the box and lipstick arrived unsealed and gave the appearance of the lipstick having been previously used. I would love to try other colors, but would order either from another vendor or direct from Kat Von D website.
customer_reviews.author: Phillygirl

customer_reviews.title: My favorite liquid lipstick
customer_reviews.text: My favorite liquid lipstick. A good chapstick is key to keeping this one looking even. But the quality is superb, application is smooth and the color is gorgeous and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: This is not for everyone. You might end up
customer_reviews.text: Better than average lipstick. Didn’t flatter my golden brown skin and dulled the color of my teeth
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Collins

customer_reviews.title: Favorite lipstick
customer_reviews.text: Always hated loved this lipstick and it is definitely the real thing for $10 less than I usually spend. There’s not a person I’ve met that doesn’t look amazing in this color(so beware your friends will wanna borrow it), and I get so many compliments when I wear it! It’s just a flattering shade all around
customer_reviews.author: Reva

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love kat von d and her makeup Lolita is prefect and stays on even after eating or drinking
customer_reviews.author: Lemeow

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and great price compared to in stores!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Quarantillo

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Dried out my lips from one use. It's a pretty color but the chemicals in it are too harsh on my lips.
customer_reviews.author: andro ghaly

customer_reviews.title: Not transfer proof
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and feel, but it is not transfer proof and that is what I was looking for. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S Bowman

customer_reviews.title: All day lip color
customer_reviews.text: Like this lip stain. Stays on a long time. Drying lips but lip gloss keeps lips semi moist.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Thompson

customer_reviews.title: SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much!!! Goes on very smooth, stays on through meals, and is very consistent. I got mine in 'Lolita.'
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: Lipstick works
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, the length the color stays on. Matte, during this mask wearing time,is just what is needed
customer_reviews.author: ️Yve

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lippie! Stays on and looks great for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Not Kat Von D
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same color as Kat Von D’s Lolita that is sold at Sephora. Also fades worse than drug store makeup. Do not waste your money on this fake ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie K.

customer_reviews.title: ... a person who particularly likes lip gloss- but I LOVE this one
customer_reviews.text: I'm not even a person who particularly likes lip gloss- but I LOVE this one! I have a medium skin color with gold undertones, and finding a lip gloss that isn't too pink or isn't too brown has always been a challenge. I tried this when a friend brought it over and was immediately in love, so I bought my own. It isn't too contrasting or "frosty" looking- a thing some darker skinned women have trouble with when wearing pinks, and it adds a nice flush of color without making me look goth (that damn bergundy trend- ugh). Its also velvety smooth, matte, and stays on all day without flaking or cracking. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Circusmind

customer_reviews.title: Lolita II NOT Lolita
customer_reviews.text: I love these lipsticks! However it is advertised as Lolita and it is not. They sent me Lolita II. Lolita II is also a very pretty color but it is lighter and not what I wanted. On the up side, I got the product very quick!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaley

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: I lost mine in California! So here I am buying another one!
customer_reviews.author: Sindy Mariscal-Garibo

customer_reviews.title: Longest lasting lipstick
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite lipstick by far. It’s a very natural color that compliments most skin tones. It lasts for hours even after eating and drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Glasgow

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Love this color and brand. Perfect mat and last a very long time. Bought another tube after it was given to me as a gift last Christmas. Part of my go to 10 minute makeup routine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color but just wish it lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PRODUCT AND COLOR! It's the longest lasting liquid lipstick I can find that doesn't flake or dry out my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Cathrine

customer_reviews.title: Disappearing lipstick
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. This is not an everlasting lipstick. Cup of coffee?? See ya lipstick! It would have been a beautiful every day lipstick if only it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: And this color is perfect, easily works for daytime and night
customer_reviews.text: OBSESSED. Liquid lipstick stays on longer than many other lipsticks I've tried, including Kat Von D's studded lipstick. I have only been able to find this product online since it's always sold out at Sephora. And this color is perfect, easily works for daytime and night.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: it only lasts for an hour or so, you ...
customer_reviews.text: it only lasts for an hour or so, you have to keep applying it, it's called everlasting but that is not right..
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: Imitation
customer_reviews.text: Although it's an imitation, it stays on longer than the ones I bought at Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful matt lip stick
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect nude with a hint of rose. Long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Scott

customer_reviews.title: This didn't last nearly all day like my other
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking for a lipstick that stayed on and didn't transfer. This didn't last nearly all day like my other.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: But It still looked gd and felt nice. Lasted pretty long too
customer_reviews.text: Says dusty rose. It was brown. No pink at all. But It still looked gd and felt nice. Lasted pretty long too.
customer_reviews.author: lizlemon333

customer_reviews.title: In love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Came in the real packaging. & looks exactly like the one from Sephora! So so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice color but not moistured (I'm aware its a matte ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice color but not moistured (I'm aware its a matte finish) but it leaves your lips vera dry
customer_reviews.author: CAROLINA ESPINOSA

customer_reviews.title: Nice color but doesn’t seem like the legit kat von ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice color but doesn’t seem like the legit kat von d. Definitely a knock off. Rubs off to easily and not matted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth and even after application lips never feel flakey. It's long lasting too
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: NOT longlasting
customer_reviews.text: My $7 nyx outlasts this. I’ve owned this product before and it performed ALOT better than this. I’m unsure if this is real..
customer_reviews.author: Joslyn Hoeffert

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Lasts a long time and looks great when I wear under a gloss too!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Longish lasting lipstick
customer_reviews.text: Lorreal lip strain last longer. However this does last longer them most. Pretty matte color
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Lip Stain Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my all time favorite color for a lip stain!! Love this Lolita vs Lolita 2. Not sure why it had to change in color but it's perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: Dried out when it got here . Color wasn't accurate
customer_reviews.author: J Rittenhouse Salem OR

customer_reviews.title: Cheap container..
customer_reviews.text: Container is already broke...and I opened and closed maybe 5 times each 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Yumi Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It appeared to be used
customer_reviews.text: There was no seal on the box or tube and it appeared to be used
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color! My sister uses it as her go ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color! My sister uses it as her go to lipstick everyday. It's long lasting and words can't describe it.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: ... it waaay cheaper at sephora) but this lipstick is pretty awesome none the less
customer_reviews.text: overpriced on amazon (you can get it waaay cheaper at sephora) but this lipstick is pretty awesome none the less. in an 8 hour period, i only had to reapply it once after eating a drinking a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: erika

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Formula!
customer_reviews.text: Classic color that suits almost everybody and have a lightweight formula!
customer_reviews.author: JoeJoe

customer_reviews.title: Didn't go well with my olive complexion
customer_reviews.text: This color looked super dark on me. Similar to a muddy brown. No pink to it at all. I doubled checked the color a few times to make sure I wasn't sent Lolita II and I wasn't. Did have a nice matte finish and good staying power.
customer_reviews.author: Martie

customer_reviews.title: The quality was great..
customer_reviews.text: The quality was great... but the color was not great with my skin tone. I gave it to my aunt and she really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting at all......
customer_reviews.text: PROS: the Lolita Chestnut color is beautiful, glides on very silky, not sticky, like the matte finish CONS: definitely not long lasting (AT ALL - comes off when drinking anything) & very drying My goal was to find a long lasting lip color but unfortunately, this was not it.
customer_reviews.author: BellyButton

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat Lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I came across this lipstick by accident in my makeup drawer; no idea how I got it in the first place. I started using it out of curiosity and fell in love with it. So, I purchased another for when it runs out and it seems like the real deal Kat Von D. The color is right so I'm keeping it. I recommend this product as I only have to touch it up mid-afternoon to keep it dark. It really has great staying power. I use a light lip balm on my lips before I put the lipstick on just to keep my lips moist, but the product is really not that drying. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Better deal here!
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this lipstick from Sephora, but they happened to be out and Amazon actually offered a better price! The color is hard to describe. Chestnut Rose is a brown pink? It’s pink, but a dusky shade with a brown undertone. I’m crazy about it and will look for it here before Sephora from now on.
customer_reviews.author: carmen

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the color (Lolita) and longevity. I have very tanned skin as I surf often. The color totally rocks my lips and tan. Totally worth the buy. I tend to have dry lips so I moisturizer hour before applying.
customer_reviews.author: Mfaith

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Lip Stick
customer_reviews.text: Always my go-to option!! I love love this brand. The color is also perfect, super perfect. It stays on for a long time and slowly fades rather than crackling.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Sorry to say...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second type of “long lasting” lipstick I’ve purchased. This one lasted 2 hours... still debating whether I should return or not...
customer_reviews.author: Ecerad

customer_reviews.title: One of My Go-To Shades
customer_reviews.text: I have over 150 lipsticks, and yet I've purchased this brand and color multiple times. It's easy to apply and lasts all day. It's also a beautiful shade that complements many different colors or looks great when worn alone.
customer_reviews.author: Lacie-Mia

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Great color. However I did not find.this product to be long wearing by any stretch of the imagination. It came off when I was drinking water.
customer_reviews.author: T. MacMillan

customer_reviews.title: Just the lip stain without lip liner.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the fall. It came on time and was in the Kat Von Dee black box with a plastic seal on the lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine T

customer_reviews.title: Looks good with anything
customer_reviews.text: I like this lipstick, and the color goes well with pretty much anything!
customer_reviews.author: shannon jenne

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I believe this lipstick is more lighter than another that I ordered (vampira). It is easy to apply, but may need retouching in the middle of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Danibunbun

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Nice color but can get this cheaper with another company
customer_reviews.author: James Saintilien

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: She love it a lot, Not paint clothes, and stays on the lips for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Sabroso

customer_reviews.title: Dark, but still Good!
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a bit darker than I expected, but that may simply be due to the color of my lips. Love Kat Von D makeup and admire that all of her products are vegan! Would Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, ok wear
customer_reviews.text: Nice color. It lasts a pretty long time, but it wears off faster than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Victorynsurrender

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice texture though
customer_reviews.text: This was a little darker than I thought it would be. More brown than rose. It's a nice texture though. Beautiful finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product. Goes on smooth and stays on well with maybe thrice daily reapplication. It's a great neutral color and looks really good with my skin tone. I'd totes buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bloczynski

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: just does not last very long and comes off on everything
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hobby

customer_reviews.title: Lip color stays
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for lips. Once it fries it stays on without getting cracked or sticky. I only have to reaplly after hot coffee. Awesome product, regardless of color you choose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Box nor lipstick were sealed so you won't know if it is new.
customer_reviews.author: carol ann goodenough

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! It's the perfect pigment! My only complaint is that it requires frequent touch ups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Worshipper

customer_reviews.title: Color was off but texture was nice
customer_reviews.text: I was slightly disappointed in this product. It wasn't as rose as the picture and more brown but went on smooth, however, could not compete with food.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hamman

customer_reviews.title: ... was expecting but the quality of this product is great. I have not purchased kat Von D cosmetics ...
customer_reviews.text: The color was a bit off from what I was expecting but the quality of this product is great. I have not purchased kat Von D cosmetics before but after trying this I definitely would like to try more.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: no good as the high price
customer_reviews.text: OMG,i was so excited to try this one, but LA girl kick it so big! no duration even 10 minutes, even the container is ugly, i wont buy more kat von d in my life. no good as the high price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Everlasting Liquid Lipstick - Lolita - Chestnut Rose - Kat Von D
product_meta.description: bold shades of Everlasting Liquid Lipstick for all-night wear, this innovative formula gives lips long-lasting wear and high-pigment color. Its creamy, color-rich formula glides over lips like a gloss but dries to a true matte finish. It’s infused with natural comfort-enhancing ingredients, including vitamin E and sunflower seed so you can flaunt lasting matte color that leaves lips feeling comfortable.
feature_bullets: A long-wear, full-coverage liquid lipstick with a smooth, matte finish.
